name: Four Directions Development Corporation
description: A nonprofit Community Development Corporation and Native Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI) created by the Penobscot Indian Nation. Their mission is to improve social and economic conditions for Native American tribes in Maine through education and investment in housing, business ventures, and entrepreneurship
services: American-Indian-owned Fiduciary services in Maine consultation

name: Penobscot Indian Nation Enterprises (PINE)
address: 107 Main Street, Orono, ME 04473 (This address is associated with Four Directions, which is closely linked to PINE and the Penobscot Nation)
description: Owned by the Penobscot Indian Nation, PINE aims to generate revenue and create jobs for its people through participation in the global economy and financing sound business ventures
services: American-Indian-owned Fiduciary services in Maine consultation
